text: 140 Days Under the World is a 1964 New Zealand short documentary film about Antarctica. It was nominated for an Academy Award for Best Documentary Short. ==References== ==External links== * *Watch One Hundred and Forty Days Under the World at NZ On Screen Category:1964 films Category:1964 documentary films Category:1964 short films Category:New Zealand films Category:English-language films Category:New Zealand documentary films Category:Short documentary films Category:Documentary films about Antarctica
title: 140 Days Under the World
